House Bill/Resolution NO. HB07968
FULL TITLE : AN ACT CREATING THE DEPARTMENT OF DISASTER RESILIENCE, DEFINING ITS POWERS AND FUNCTIONS, APPROPRIATING FUNDS THEREFOR, AND FOR OTHER PURPOSES
ABSTRACT : Creates a department that will handle national calamities characterized by unity of command, science-based approach and in charge of risk reduction, preparedness and response, and recovery and rehabilitation.
